Interface GameView

All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedGameView, GameViewDecorator, GuiController
public interface GameView
Interface for game view contract between logic and UI.

    • showMessage

      default void showMessage(String message)
      Shows a message to the player. Default implementation does nothing.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display

    • showEventMessage

      default void showEventMessage(String message)
      Shows an event message (for mystery mode events). Default implementation does nothing.
      Parameters:
      message - the event message to display

    • playEarthquakeAnimation

      default void playEarthquakeAnimation()
      Plays the earthquake visual effect. Default implementation does nothing.

    • animateLevelIncrement

      default void animateLevelIncrement()
      Plays the level increment animation. Default implementation does nothing.

    • showFogEffect

      default void showFogEffect(int seconds)
      Shows the fog effect for the specified duration. Default implementation does nothing.
      Parameters:
      seconds - duration of the fog effect

    • showHeavyGravityEffect

      default void showHeavyGravityEffect(int seconds)
      Shows the heavy gravity effect indicator. Default implementation does nothing.
      Parameters:
      seconds - duration of the effect
